title: What are some of the best examples of cutting edge technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Invisible cars. Mercedes-Benz ran a program demonstrating a new camera-in-projector technology, which I happened to see through Yahoo News:  There’s the acoustic levitation (levitation-using-sound-waves) project (below). Researchers use sound waves to make lightweight objects levitate.  Successful simple over-unity (below). The effect is of a Siimple Magnetic Over-Unity Toy (SMOT) but without magnets (pretty ingenious). If the marble can activate the next lever this would constitute free, repeatable motion, since no additional altitude change is necessary. I believe this is POSSIBLE, because the marble can have a midpoint that is taller than the start altitude of the lever, and the device has been proven to have momentum in the video below. See also the version with a tall marble that would be necessary for perpetual motion: File:1st Fully Proven Perpetual Motion Machine.jpg  And still other devices might exist, for example, the Over-Unity Lever 2 (below). A lever can lift its own fulcrum at minimal expense in certain very precise configurations. I found this experiment very exciting, but it has NOT been publicly recognized:  I can’t think of anything else right now since most of my other experiments are not so noteworthy, but these inventions surely ARE significant! (the first two inventions are not mine).

Cutting-edge technology refers to technological devices, techniques or achievements that employ the most current and high-level IT developments; in other words, technology at the frontiers of knowledge. Leading and innovative IT industry organizations are often referred to as "cutting edge." Cutting Edge Technology Examples You Won’t Believe Exist Augmented reality: Eliminating buyer’s remorseVirtual footwear: The virtual AdiVerseEngineered Stem CellsWearable technology: Powering recreation with wearable technologyNanotechnologyFacial recognition: NAB and Microsoft creating better customer experiencesWireless Power: electromagnetic inductionSuperfast Broadband- Ethernet-based networkArtificial Intelligence- artificial consciousnessBlockchainAtmospheric EnergyDeep Data Mining: the strategy of data collectionSmart CitiesThe future promises a lot of news. In fact, many of them are already part of our daily lives and some of these cutting-edge technologies will definitely change our world in future.
